bibl.title: A Ḥadīth Fragment on Papyrus.
bibl.note: Fragment of papyrus contains a tradition ascribed to ʿthe third caliph Umar b. al-Khaṭṭāb (d. 23/644) also known from literary sources. The text written on the re-used back of an official text, allows to discuss how such traditions might have functioned in the written culture of the early Abbasid Empire.
